text:
@MikeBloomberg @NYAnna22 It’s not just COVID #coronavirus 

Asking everyone to wear masks like this will cause opportunistic infections 

Make underlining conditions worse

And extreme anxiety from misinformation 

We need our breath & immunity 

Business dictating healthcare🥵
@CDCgov @HHSGov @NIH @WHO
